Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Backup

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Backup
public class Backup
extends java.lang.Object
Class Backup is used to save backups to manage client disconnections and the interruption of the server execution.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Backup()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String checkOldGames​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> usernames)
    Method checkOldGames searches in the gameBackup file for a previous unfinished game with the same usernames as the one passed by param.
    static void removeGame()
    Method removeGame overwrites the gameBackup with the content of the JsonArray.
    static void restoreGame()
    Method restoreGame restores a Game from the data read in the JsonObject with the selected date.
    static Player restorePlayer​(java.lang.String username, com.google.gson.JsonObject player)
    Method restorePlayer restores a single Player from the JsonObject
    static java.util.List<Player> restorePlayers​(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonElement)
    Method restorePlayers restores from the JsonElement the list of players of the game that has to be restored.
    static void saveGame()
    Method saveGame writes in the gameBackup file the current game data.
    static void setDate​(java.lang.String date)
    Set date
    static void setJsonArray()
    Method setJsonArray reads from the gameBackup file and sets the JsonArray
    static void setSavedGameJsonObject()
    Method setSavedGameJsonObject search for the current game in the JsonArray and sets the JsonObject

    • setJsonArray

      public static void setJsonArray()
      Method setJsonArray reads from the gameBackup file and sets the JsonArray

    • setSavedGameJsonObject

      public static void setSavedGameJsonObject()
      Method setSavedGameJsonObject search for the current game in the JsonArray and sets the JsonObject

    • removeGame

      public static void removeGame()
      Method removeGame overwrites the gameBackup with the content of the JsonArray.

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame()
      Method saveGame writes in the gameBackup file the current game data.

    • checkOldGames

      public static java.lang.String checkOldGames​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> usernames)
      Method checkOldGames searches in the gameBackup file for a previous unfinished game with the same usernames as the one passed by param.
      Parameters:
      usernames - is a set of String which are the usernames of the connected clients.
      Returns:
      a String containing the date/s of the previous unfinished game/s or null if there aren't.

    • restoreGame

      public static void restoreGame()
      Method restoreGame restores a Game from the data read in the JsonObject with the selected date.

    • restorePlayers

      public static java.util.List<Player> restorePlayers​(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonElement)
      Method restorePlayers restores from the JsonElement the list of players of the game that has to be restored.
      Parameters:
      jsonElement - is the JsonElement that contains the necessary data to restore the players.
      Returns:
      the list of Players of the restored Game.

    • restorePlayer

      public static Player restorePlayer​(java.lang.String username, com.google.gson.JsonObject player)
      Method restorePlayer restores a single Player from the JsonObject
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the Player to restore.
      player - is the JsonObject from which to get the data.
      Returns:
      a new Player with all the data correctly set.

    • setDate

      public static void setDate​(java.lang.String date)
      Set date
      Parameters:
      date - of chosen game
